name: Blasteroid
description:
Blasteroid was inspired by playing Asteroids on an original unit in a San Francisco museum. 

The game follows these design philosophies:

  • Minimalistic, Asteroids-style geometric graphics
  • Unforgiving - instant death, while still carrying a feeling of improvement and progression with each failure
  • A bleak future setting - conveyed through a heavy synth soundtrack and pixel art
  • An unfolding story as the player beats each stage
  • Intuitive control system, using only one finger with bare minimum instructions (one word prompts)
